name: Forbiddance
flavorText: A powerful invisible ward protects you from your enemies’ efforts to magically spy on you and from enemies who try to teleport into your presence.
text: No scrying sensor can enter the area of Forbiddance and no creature can teleport into it, unless the sensor or the creature is higher level than the ritual caster who performed the ritual.  Your Arcana check determines the size of the warded area, which is a burst.
